key_mistakes.reason: Loses material by allowing a strong pawn on e6.
Allows the opponent to gain a tempo with a better position.
Captures a pawn but opens up vulnerabilities.
Blunder that results in a lost position.
A blunder that worsens the position significantly.

recommendations: Focus on completing development efficiently and maintaining pawn structure.
Avoid unnecessary exchanges if they weaken your position.
Improve tactical awareness to spot opportunities and threats.
Consider alternatives that maintain or improve piece activity and coordination.
